          Razor: I agree. We can attach to ship directly to the =

            : : Hollywood/Sting : :

            Hollywood turned to loo=
k at Diesel and Razor.

            Hollywood:  Oh, hey guys.  The ship has=
 a lot of goodies.  On these disks, is every byte of data on this computer,=
 including a map of the whole Earth, and it maps the locations of the trans=
former factions here too, and other stuff.  Right now brothers, I'm just ch=
ecking the quality of the parts of the ship.  It could possible serve usefu=
l to attach it to our own base.

            Meanwhile, Sting comes out of =
his CR Chamber.  He was formerly black and white, and although it was fitti=
ng, not only did he get the logo, but all the white on him was replaced wit=
h red.  He sees that the entrance is open, and exits the base.  He then see=
s that Diesel, Razor and Hollywood are inside the ship.  He walks in.

    =
        Sting:  Oh,  hey guys.  What have you done here so far, Hollywood?
=

            Hollywood:  Oh, nothing much brother, I've contained all the d=
ata stored on the ship onto these disks, and I'm just taking a look at the =
equipment.

-----------------------------------

black and white, the only change was the nWo logo. Diesel retained his blac=
k and silver, again only the nWo logo was new.

              They looked a=
round seeing that Hollywood was gone.

              Razor: Maybe he is in =
the ship.

              They both walk out and notice that the doors are o=
pen. They climb into the ship.

              Diesel: Find anything worthwh=
ile Hollywood?
